Name: Chaos Jazz
Desc4: <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by 15%. While off-field, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. When switching on-field, this buff continues for 5s, and this continuation effect can trigger once every 7.5s.
Story: A Drive Disc with a steep learning curve that really tests users' understanding of Ether devices.
